Equipment Actions.Action 1: Longsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Ultroloth can use its Hypnotic Gaze and makes 3 melee attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Hypnotic Gaze, The Ultroloth's eyes sparkle as it targets one creature and attempts to charm and stun them
Other Actions.Action 3: Teleport, The Ultroloth magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Ultroloth can innately cast a lot of spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Ultroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Weapons, The Ultroloth's weapons attacks are magical

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
